channel.title: [Religion] Rapture is Crapture! Antichrist a fake?
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][b]Rapture is Crapture! Antichrist a fake?[/b][/size][/center]
BEFORE YOU POST ABOUT YOUR OPINION WHICH IS PROBABLY INSULTING, PLEASE BE SURE TO ACTUALLY READ THE FOLLOWING ARTICLE WITHOUT BEING A DINK AND ANNOYING EVERYONE BY SAYING SOMETHING DUMB! BLAH BLAH BLAH. FUCK THAT, READ THE ARTICLE FIRST! Thanks. :)
[url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/tony-hendra/the-rapture-is-crapture-_b_19606.html]Rapture is Crapture Part 1[/url] - Read this article ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- [url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/tony-hendra/the-rapture-crapture-par_b_19996.html]Rapture is Crapture Part 2[/url] - This article is interesting [url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/tony-hendra/the-rapture-is-crapture-p_b_20781.html]Rapture is Crapture Part 3[/url] - Another interesting article.
The first article is all that's required to read, and it will only take you a couple minutes.
Please don't be retarded and post an opinion about it before reading it. I know I said it 3 times, and even capitalized it in the beginning, but people will still act like doofuses and post an opinion without knowing what the f*** they're talking about. :rolleyes:
If there is a word you don't understand in the article, don't hesitate to search for it on [url=http://www.dictionary.com]Dictionary.com[/url].
~Ron :)
PS: If you're wondering, Rapture Crapture is a book, and these articles are just derived from the book. I think.

item.title: [Religion] Rapture is Crapture! Antichrist a fake?
item.dc:creator: @DA_ew DÂ®ew
item.description:
@DA_ew wrote:

I know this is completly of topic (well maybe I don’t know) I sorta belive in god I dont doubt he exist so what would happen to me (If this where to happen). Also by refering to the Antichrist would that mean anyone who doesnt belive in the exsitance of god.

Now back on topic. This is very hard for me to comprhend because I’m 13 so could someone explain this as simple as possible (I do get the Judas part).

Read full topic

I’m just informing some people here as to what the antichrist is? I never said I believe that. Hey btw, I haven’t been to church in 3 years. Revelations was just some late night reading one night when I couldn’t sleep. Lol.
[/quote]
lol say that next time. We can’t read your mind… yet. :D[/quote]

item.title: [Religion] Rapture is Crapture! Antichrist a fake?
item.dc:creator: @progrip13 progrip13
item.description:
@progrip13 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:29, topic:2734”][quote author=progrip13 link=topic=3006.msg66752#msg66752 date=1152986308]
I’ve read revelations fully. There are three antichrists that are on earth and wreak havoc in the final days to prepare for satan’s coming to earth as a giant dragon. Then satan enslaves all the non believers and sinners and puts 666 on their foreheads. Then after angels come down and do their work the believers are swept into heaven as spirits and then put back in bodily form at the new jerusalem with streets and rivers of gold. Then satan and his followers are cast into a burning lake with brimstone (sulfur) coming down from the skies upon them.
[/quote]
What does that have to do with the articles. Thank you Bible Man. Just go back to church and they will continue the brain washing. :D[/quote]

I’m just informing some people here as to what the antichrist is? I never said I believe that. Hey btw, I haven’t been to church in 3 years. Revelations was just some late night reading one night when I couldn’t sleep. Lol.

item.title: [Religion] Rapture is Crapture! Antichrist a fake?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Rapture is crapture, yet Antichrist is not Fake.

The Antichrist will decieve many INCLUDING THE DAMN PEOPLE THAT BELIEVE IN TEH RAPTURE.
Whanna know why? Read on xD

The people that believe in the rapture believe that they will somehow “float” up into heaven before the Antichrist comes.
Well, what if they are wrong; what if they don’t ‘float up into Heaven’? Well then the Antichrist will come and they won’t recognize him.
The Antichrist IS going to make the world ‘better’. He will solve hunger, and he will solve poverty. They will worship him (Figuratively >>) in everything he does. (Remember, they don’t think he is the Antichrist, right?)

And that is how the Antichrist will decieve many

Read full topic
